entry.title: Public Meeting Notice: Dog Control Board
entry.summary: ROSEBURG, Ore. - The Douglas County Dog Control Board will hold a meeting on Wednesday, January 10, 2024, at 6:00 p.m. at the Douglas County Courthouse, Room 216, located at 1036 SE Douglas Avenue, Roseburg, Oregon 97470. The agenda meeting agenda can be located at: www.dcso.com/dogboard In compliance with ORS 192.610 to 192.690, we will accommodate any member of the public who wishes to watch the meeting. To view the live stream or post meeting recording, please visit: https://video.ibm.com/channel/douglascountyoregon. Please contact the Sheriff's Office located in Room 210 of the Justice Building at the Douglas County Courthouse, 1036 SE Douglas Ave. Roseburg, OR 97470 541- 440-4449, if you need an accommodation.

entry.title: Level III Sex Offender, Uriah Strauss, Arrested for Attempting Contact With Minor Child
entry.summary: ROSEBURG, Ore. - A Level III Sex Offender has been taken into custody after writing a letter to a minor child. On Wednesday, January 3, 2024, Douglas County Sheriff's Deputies received a report that 44-year-old Uriah Shawn Strauss of Roseburg sent a letter to a minor child at a local high school. The letter outlined Strauss' desire to strike up a romantic relationship with a woman of at least 16-years of age. Strauss was located at the Roseburg Rescue Mission where he was interviewed and taken into custody for Attempted Unlawful Contact with a Child. The Douglas County Sheriff's Office previously notified the public that Strauss, a Level III sex offender, was sending letters that were filled with sexually explicit content, causing alarm and apprehension regarding personal safety to various women in and out of our community. “We renew our request that anyone who has received a similar letter from Strauss, especially anyone under the age of 18, to contact our office.”, Lt. Brad O'Dell said. "We believe that Strauss has likely attempted contact with other juveniles. It is important that we hear from anyone who Strauss has contacted or attempted to contact. Strauss was lodged at the Douglas County Jail where he remains in custody.

entry.title: Large Meth Seizure
entry.summary:
In the early morning hours of Sunday, December 31st, detectives with the Douglas Interagency Narcotics Team (DINT) arrested two California individuals traveling to Douglas County with the intent to deliver a large load of methamphetamine.
At approximately 4:00 AM detectives initiated a traffic stop on a 2020 GMC Sierra pickup at the intersection of Main Street and Chief Miwaleta Lane in Canyonville. The vehicle was occupied by 46 year old Marcus Fuentes and 39 year old Stela Vigue, both of Bakersfield, California.
Detectives suspected the vehicle contained a large load of methamphetamine being delivered here from California. Detectives quickly obtained a search warrant for the vehicle and inside the passenger compartment they found approximately 21 pounds of suspected methamphetamin…
